name: Push Box Go! Go! Go!
description:
Push Box is one of the best logic puzzle game.

Push Box like sokoban is a classic puzzle game invented in Japan. The object of the game is to push boxes into their correct position in a crowded warehouse with a minimal number of moves. The boxes can only be pushed, never pulled, so you have to be careful not to push them into a corner where you can't get them out again. You can only push one box at the time. You can move around by using the four arrow buttons.

*** Features***
- 3800 levels
- 10 different game packs
- Game Center achievements as you solve levels and complete packs
- Smooth, polished touch interaction
- Colorful UI
